What are the treatments for Knobloch syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Knobloch syndrome:  - American Academy of Ophthalmology: Eye Smart  - Genetic Testing Registry: Knobloch syndrome 1  - JAMA Patient Page: Retinal Detachment  - National Eye Institute: Facts About Retinal Detachment  - Prevent Blindness America: Retinal Tears and Detachments   These resources fr
